item.title: Continuous integration with GitHub Actions

item.description: A look at GitHub Actions, and the good and bad of coupling automation

item.title: Oh, fork it
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: Why you should fork obscure, interesting repositories

item.title: What happens when GitHub decides you're not a human
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: GitHub hiding my profile reminds me there are no guarantees of your presence on online services.

item.title: Working with multiple SSH keys: setting up git over SSH with GitHub and Bitbucket
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: How to setup .ssh/config to use different ssh keys for different servers, e.g. when connecting to GitHub and Bitbucket.

item.title: How to access GitHub over SSH on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: How to use GitHub over SSH in Ubuntu, and forward SSH keys to other shell accounts.
